alert.note: Alert for Cooke; Grayson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Cooke and Grayson Counties through 630 AM CDT... At 559 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Madill to near Hubert H Moss Lake. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sherman, Gainesville, Whitesboro, Denison, Howe, Pottsboro, Collinsville, Gunter, Lindsay, Callisburg, Knollwood, Dorchester, Randell Lake, Lake Kiowa, Eisenhower State Park, Lake Texoma, Preston, Southmayd, Sadler and Walnut Bend. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 496 and 503. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for north central Texas.
